snippet.title: Vengeance of Mr. Peppermint - Official Trailer | Publisher Spotlights Showcase 2023 (Freedom Games)
snippet.description: Get another look at Vengeance of Mr. Peppermint in this latest action-packed trailer for the upcoming old-school, Korean-style beat-’em-up game. In Vengeance of Mr. Peppermint, embody a hard-boiled detective seeking bloody justice. Plow through the criminal underworld to find and punish those responsible for his sister's death...before his mind unravels and his vengeance completely destroys him.
